thread.title: Noel Gallagher announces another Hydro date
thread.title_full: Noel Gallagher announces another Hydro date (From Herald Scotland)

author: Stacey Mullen
title: Noel Gallagher announces another Hydro date
text:
Noel Gallagher's High Flying Birds are coming back to the SSE Hydro next year as the rock legend has announced a new UK tour.
The former Oasis star, who played the venue earlier this year and closed T in the Park at Strathallan Castle in July, will perform in Glasgow on April 21.
He is also due to return to the city on December 8 to play Clyde 1 live alongside the Stereophonics, Foxes, Tom Odell and Kodaline.
The songwriter is due to release new single The Dying of the Light on December 11 with B side The Girl With X-Ray Eyes.
Special guests for the tour will be the Super Furry Animals.
Tickets go on sale at 9am on Friday, October 23 and are available from www.thessehydro.com or 0844 395 4000.
Tickets prices range from £39.75 to £79.45 (inc. admin fee).
Share article
